title: Mortal Kombat vs Marvel vs Capcom vs Soul Calibur vs Tekken vs Smash Bros
body:
So, we have 5 very popular fighting games. Each series with it's own unique style to it. Which is the best fighting game in your opinion? 

Forgot Street Fighter, and don't know how to edit the poll. But definitely a great game in it's own right. I feel ashamed for forgetting this.
